name: Sharpness History
description:
Pitch

"Play as a village blacksmith and prove your rightness by giving your customers a weapon that fits them. Enjoy, or not, the consequences of your actions."

Feature
  • medieval futuristic universe
  • several stories
  • choice from left to right 
Credits

Game Designers : Grégoire Vottero, Nino Barbier, William Lavergne
Game Artists : Lilian Clairville, Timothée Potard
Game Programmers : Antoine Dirion,  Thomas Raulin, Arthur Pejoiane
